ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Modified blackbody disk model. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A modified blackbody disk model. The spectrum from the inner region of an accretion disk where the viscosity is dominated by radiation pressure.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: central mass in units of solar mass
inner disk radius in gravitational ( = 3 Schwarzschild) radii
cos(i)/d^2, where i is the inclination of the disk and d is the distance in units of 10 kpc

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
